sources.title: The Road to Hollywood
sources.description: Exploitation film-maker Bud Pollard appears on screen to tell us of Bing Crosby's rise to fame, using scenes from four early Crosby shorts to illustrate his fictional biography

sources.title: Gas House Kids In Hollywood (1947)
sources.description: Carl Alfalfa Switzer, Tommy Butch Bond, Benny Bartlett

sources.title: The Road to Hollywood (1947) Bing Crosby | Biography, Comedy, Musical, Documentary
sources.description:
Film director Bud Pollard appears on screen to tell us of Bing Crosby's rise to fame, using scenes from four early Crosby shorts to illustrate his fictional biography.

Directors: Bud Pollard, Del Lord
Writers: John E. Gordon, Harry McCoy 
Stars: Bing Crosby, Luis Alberni, Ann Christy 
Genres: Biography, Comedy, Musical
